|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/mts/mts_wg430223 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/mts/wg430223 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== *J4 - 4-pin header (1 - VCC, 2 - TX, 3 - RX, 4 - GND) ====MTD==== 
dev:    size   erasesize  name
mtd0: 07f80000 00020000 "ALL"
mtd1: 00100000 00020000 "Bootloader"
mtd2: 00100000 00020000 "Config"
mtd3: 00100000 00020000 "Factory"
mtd4: 02000000 00020000 "Kernel"
mtd5: 01be0000 00020000 "RootFS"
mtd6: 02000000 00020000 "Kernel2"
mtd7: 01be0000 00020000 "RootFS2"
mtd8: 00200000 00020000 "glbcfg"
mtd9: 00100000 00020000 "board_data"
mtd10: 00200000 00020000 "glbcfg2"
mtd11: 00100000 00020000 "board_data2"
mtd12: 03680000 00020000 "data"
